short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A breathtaking sunset by the river

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A serene tool featuring a breathtaking sunset by the river, where a child gazes at the horizon. Displays the current time and provides live weather updates in a simple, calming interface that blends seamlessly with the tranquil background.
